member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.Barcode.BarcodeObjectsManager
member.summary: Creates a Barcode objects manager that extracts barcode features in a form. The created object is added to ObjectsManagers.
member.remarks: This manager detects barcode features of the forms. Colored barcode is supported if the spaces color is closer white than black and the bars color is closer to black than white
member.example: For an example, refer to ObjectsManagers.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.Recognition.Barcode.BarcodeObjectsManager.Engine
member.summary: Gets/sets the barcode engine to read barcodes.
member.value: The that is used in this to perform barcode reading
